author: av8r1973
title: Essential for making your trains move
review:
Not a lot to review here, it's a Train Motor.  For such an essential component to any powered train (modern ones, anyway), it's surprisingly cheap.  Especially for LEGO.

This motor happily pulls a 6-7 car train around the curves of my City track layout with ease.  It's also quiet.  I can only hope the little rubber gaskets on the traction wheels don't dry rot over the years, but they are holding up for now.

Several of the recent trains can be motorized (Emerald Night, Maersk) by using this motor and I fully recommend that you get this motor for exactly that purpose.
